participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and passionate about fitness and health, with a love for vibrant colors and food.
participant_1.background: i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i'm in college to become a nurse. i recently got an apartment with my best friend.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Resilient and introspective, navigating life's challenges while striving for recovery.
participant_2.background: i'm a 45 year old male. i am a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i now live in the city.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

my favorite color is yellow.
i love italian food and garlic bread.
i am a gold medalist olympian.
gymnastics is my favorite sport.
i workout four hours a day.
